title: Ex on the Beach (US)
resume: Can you ever really be over your ex? In this social experiment, ten smoking hot celebrity singles think they are running away to a tropical island for a once in a lifetime romantic vacation of fun and sun. But just as the party is getting starting, some unwanted guests arrive to break up their good time. Paradise turns into a nightmare when their exes start emerging from the beach and everyone is left wondering “whose ex is next?” Caught in a complicated web of hookups, deceit, and revenge, will old loves reignite or will the flame of romance be gone for good. Welcome to “Ex On The Beach.”
